definition: old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
polite term for old woman or man
(idiom) ignore your elders at your peril
pinyin: bu4 ting1 lao3 ren2 yan2 , chi1 kui1 zai4 yan3 qian2
containing_words.word: 不聽老人言，吃虧在眼前

sentences.english: Around 4-6% of elderly people have experienced some form of maltreatment at home.
sentences.chinese: 約有4%到6%的老人在家中受到某種形式的虐待。

sentences.english: Older singletons are using the sites as a way to find love.
sentences.chinese: 孤寡老人使用此類網站尋找真愛。

sentences.english: All these facilities help society reduce the generation gap between the elderly and the others.
sentences.chinese: 這可以協助縮小老人和其他人之間的代溝。

sentences.english: Nothing can beguile the old man.
sentences.chinese: 什麼也欺騙不了這位老人。

sentences.english: So what does kill off the oldest old?
sentences.chinese: 那麼是什麼導致了老邁老人的死亡？

sentences.english: The old man provided an idea for his son on how to run a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 這位老人就如何經營飯店給他的兒子支招兒。

sentences.english: Do your kids still believe in Santa Claus?
sentences.chinese: 你的孩子還相信有聖誕老人嗎？

sentences.english: Praise God that He loves the oft-forgotten elderly.
sentences.chinese: 感謝神，祂的慈愛遍及被人遺忘的老人。

sentences.english: The old man faltered as he climbed the hill.
The fish just moved away slowly and the old man could not raise him an inch.
sentences.chinese: 那魚只顧慢慢地遊開去，老人無法把它往上拉一英寸。

sentences.english: In China, respect for your elders, for your forbears , is even more important than making money.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，尊敬老人和列祖列宗要比賺錢更爲重要。

sentences.english: Higuchi reads a quote from an elderly man who returned for the reunion.
sentences.chinese: 樋口讀取從一個老人團聚返回的報價。

sentences.english: Recently a plastic Santa Claus was ripped off a door.
sentences.chinese: 最近，一個塑料聖誕老人被人從門上撕掉了。

sentences.english: 60-year old Ren Jinxiang is among the anxious farmers.
sentences.chinese: 60歲的任金祥老人是擔憂的農民之一。

sentences.english: There have only ever been 106 verified supercentenarians in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 在英國也只有106位已覈實的超級百歲老人。

sentences.english: Surprised, the old man put on his spectacles and stared at him.
sentences.chinese: 那老人驚訝地戴上眼鏡，望着他。

definition: (coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
(of an elderly couple) husband or wife
erhua variant of 老伴[lao3 ban4]
polite term for old woman or man
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
